body:
Hi Chien,



First of all I'd like to say thanks for the videos! Very educational and well made. 



I managed to run a few simulations on a quite complicated model very fast using your videos.



I was wondering if there are more coming (as you can imagine no amount of new exciting knowledge is enough for us!). Of course, I realize that, much like Mostapha and Chris, this is out of your free time.



I wonder if I can put some odd questions here (warning: might be dumb).



- Is it possible to have non airconditioned spaces within the model? I tried bypassing the OS Systems component and link directly to the simulation component but that only applied ideal air loads to the zones.

- Is it possible to have multiple systems within the same model? If yes, should I just use multiple OS Systems and PlantDesigner components for each system?

- If I want to model multiple (e.g. 3) AHU for one floor, should I also use 3x AHU components and link the zones that each unit is supplying air too (duh)? Or will that not really improve accuracy of design.

- Is it possible to have just mechanical ventilation and not aircondition systems (e.g. Warehouse spaces)? If yes, do I just leave the plant details empty? 



Thanks in advance for any response.



Wish you good luck with your research! And thanks for your work!



Kind regards,

Theodore.
